column1: #Text=Dai Li agent says : " There 's no war in Ba Sing Se . "
#Text=" Dai Li agent says : " There is no war within the walls .
#Text=" Katara says : " You ca n't keep the truth from all these people .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Until now , you 've been treated as our honored guest .
#Text=But from now on , you will be watched every moment by Dai Li agents .
#Text=If you mention the War to anyone , you will be expelled from the city .
#Text=I understand you 've been looking for your bison .
#Text=It would be quite a shame if you were not able to complete your quest .
#Text=Now , Joo Dee will show you to your home .
